scripts.lint: eslint . && echo '✅ ESLint: No issues found!'
scripts.lint:fix: eslint . --fix && echo '✅ ESLint: Fixed all auto-fixable issues!'
scripts.format: prettier --write "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,css,md}" "*.{js,ts,json,md}" && echo '✅ Prettier: All files formatted!'
scripts.type-check: tsc --noEmit && echo '✅ TypeScript: No type errors!'
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run type-check && echo '✅ All checks passed!'
